alert.note: Alert for Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 4:05PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Tensas Parish through 445 PM CDT... At 405 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Newlight, or 13 miles east of Winnsboro, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Somerset around 430 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana...and southwestern and west central Mississippi.
